title.rendered: STEDI LED STRIP LIGHT 12V WATERPROOF 5M ROLL

content.rendered:
STEDI Flexible 5050 SMD LED Strip lighting for 12v automotive application. Not to be confused with the plethora of other cheap LED Strip Light available online, our strip lighting are built to last.

12v Strip LED Lights

OVERVIEW

The perfect addition to any build whether it be some additional lighting on the inside or some useful light on the outside. The LED Strip Light is able to be cut to different lengths depending on your intended use and being waterproof will run no issues regardless of where you end up installing.

SIZE TO APPLICATION

As stated above the LED Strip is able to be cut to the size or the purpose. Markings are inprinted on the strip allowing you to make adjustments to the size of incriments of 3 LEDs.

GENUINE 3M

Running genuine 3M double sided adhesive tape for a quick and easy installation with a UV stabilized coating to ensure the strip won’t crack or fade to yellow throughout the test of time.

DETAILS

Today. there is no shortage of LED strip light on the market, all which seemingly have a similar specification. There are few however that withstand the test of time quite like ours. The cheap stuff burns through substrate leading to premature failures. Our own showroom featured 15m of our strip light for a period of 5 years with more than 10,000 hours of run time with 900 out of 900 LED full functioning!

OUR KEY QUALITY DIFFERENCE

  • 5050SMD with 60 LEDs per meters, ensure no break in light output.
  • LEDs are binned to ensure each and every emitter has consistent brightness and CCT.
  • Thick copper track to ensure adequate cooling to avoid premature LED Failure
  • Properly matched resistors to ensure LED are not overdriven.
  • UV Stabilized coating to ensures our coating wont crack or turn yellow
  • Ingress Protection 65 – Suitable for outdoor and marine use
  • True White 5500K
  • Genuine 3M double-sided adhesive – Heat Activated
  • Can be cut-down every 3rd LED

APPLICATION

  • Clearance Lighting
  • Side-step lighting
  • Awning and Tent Lights
  • Cargo Area (Utes, Vans & 4×4)
  • Under Engine Bonnet for work light
  • Boat Cabin and Deck
  • Tool Boxes
  • Dog Boxes & Trays

SPECIFICATIONS

LED 5050 SMD
LED DENSITY 60 LEDS PER METRE
WATER & DUST PROOF IP65
VOLTAGE 12VDC ONLY
LENGTH 5 METRES
COLOUR TEMP 5500 KELVIN
POWER CONSUMPTION: 3.8A at 13.6V (5m Roll)

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x 5M 12v LED Strip Light

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI LED STRIP LIGHT 12V WATERPROOF 5M ROLL

 

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
